title: Did a participant in the clinical trial develop "bloody crust" from the COVID-19 vaccine?
subtitle: The prosecution, which spread over the Internet against immunization without context, stems from the GoFundme page, whose allegations have since been retracted by her organization.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: One participant in a clinical trial of Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 developed a painful skin reaction on her feet as a result of taking that vaccine.
